Bugfix release --------------
Aside from the above mentioned issues this release includes the following important fixes:
- Synchronized bundled GD library with GD 2.0.23. - Fixed a bug that prevented compilation of GD extensions against FreeType 2.1.0-2.1.2. - Fixed thread safety issue with informix connection id. - Fixed incorrect resolving of relative paths by glob() in windows. - Fixed mapping of Greek letters to html entities. - Fixed a bug that caused an on shutdown crash when using PHP with Apache 2.0.49. - Fixed a number of crashes inside pgsql, cpdf and gd extensions. - All in all this release fixes over 30 bugs that have been discovered and resolved since the 4.3.6 release.
For a full list of changes in PHP 4.3.7, see the [ChangeLog](/ChangeLog-4.php#4.3.7).
